newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Kwong Sang meetings to be held March 5.
newsitem.headline: Kwong Sang meetings to be held March 5.

text.p: Kwong Sang Hong International Ltd would hold its adjourned court meeting and special general meeting regarding its privatisation on March 5, Kwong Sang Hong and Peregrine Investments Holdings Ltd said.

If the privatisation proposal is approved, it will become effective on March 19 and Kwong Sang Hong will withdraw its listing on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong on March 21, the companies said in a joint statement on Tuesday.
Investment bank Peregrine in December said it would privatise property company Kwong Sang Hong.
Details of the adjourned meetings, new proxy forms, additional details regarding the proposal and a revised timetable had been despatched to shareholders on Monday, the statement said.
